actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the suspension of annual assessment work on mining claims held by location in the United States.

summary.text: Provides for the suspension until September 1, 1980, of annual assessment work which requires that not less than $100 worth of labor performed or improvements aggregating such amount each year on mining claims in the United States. Requires the holders of such mining claims to file annually a notice indicating that the claimant desires to continue to hold the claim.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the suspension of annual assessment work on mining claims held by location in the United States.
